meanings.definition: Bend or stretch (a part of the body) to exercise or strengthen it.
meanings.sent1: She flexes her arms before lifting weights.
meanings.sent2: He flexes his legs before going for a run.
meanings.sent3: The yoga instructor flexes her muscles in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: Like a rubber band, he flexes his body to reach new limits.
meanings.sent5: With determination, she flexes her body to achieve fitness goals.

meanings.definition: Show off one's strength or muscles.
meanings.sent1: He flexes his biceps to impress his friends.
meanings.sent2: She flexes her muscles after a tough workout.
meanings.sent3: The bodybuilder flexes his muscles in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: His confidence flexes like a proud peacock.
meanings.sent5: Flexing his muscles, he proudly displays his hard work.

meanings.definition: To exhibit a particular skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: She flexes her artistic talents in painting.
meanings.sent2: He flexes his problem-solving skills in challenging situations.
meanings.sent3: The magician flexes his tricks to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flexes like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: Flexing his expertise, he solves the puzzle effortlessly.
